test.name: test_system_load.sh
test.about: This test checks the system load of the VoBox and gives a warning if it exceeds a certain value. The warning and critical status thresholds are given in the output below.
test.log: *** Get uptime and load information 14:24:00 up 111 days, 3:19, 5 users, load average: 0.52, 0.25, 0.14 *** Current loads (rounded): *** 1 minute average: 0 *** 5 minute average: 0 *** 15 minute average: 0 *** Current thresholds: *** 1 minute average: 10 (warning), 14 (critical) *** 5 minute average: 8 (warning), 12 (critical) *** 15 minute average: 5 (warning), 7 (critical) ******************* ***** Test OK ***** *******************
